The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19438 (Introduce deploymentstatus by ajtowns)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review

This appears to be minor typos, rephrasing and a renaming of `RewindBlockIndex` to `NeedsRedownload` and `BlockMetadataManager` to `BlockManager`. It would be nice for reviewers to have a PR description explaining the context for these renamings rather than needing to explore a chain of PRs to figure it out.\n\n`RewindBlockIndex` was removed in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21009 but w
> It seems to be introduced in #15606 but that isn't merged yet.\n\nI don't think this pull introduces it either. It is just another outdated comment (or typo) in the pull description.
> needing to explore a chain of PRs to figure it out\n\nForce pushed to mention the commit id in the commit body
